TopicTitle: Game wont let me recover ships

Articles.Content:
The mods I use are: BD armory, Interstellar mod, B9 aerospace, Kerbal foundries, Kerbal Konstructs, Kerbinside, and tweak scale.

when I try to recover a ship it will give me money and science, but it will not recover. then whatever science experiments were on that ship will never give me science again on any ship. This is kind of game-breaking, so if a solution could be found, please tell me quick.

3 hours ago, Crudecreeper said:

when I try to recover a ship it will give me money and science, but it will not recover. then whatever science experiments were on that ship will never give me science again on any ship. This is kind of game-breaking, so if a solution could be found, please tell me quick.

 

Kerbal Konstructs doesn't work with 1.0.5 delete it and anything that uses it and it will be fixed. Had the same problem
